title: B.S. Report - The Grantland Basketball Hour (Ep. 2)
description: On 'The Grantland Basketball Hour,' Zach Lowe considers the Oklahoma City Thunder's playoff odds and ESPN's Ramona Shelburne breaks down the losing Lakers.
